query:
SELECT flow_id FROM flows
                WHERE
                    (cast($1 as TEXT[]) IS NULL OR flow_type = ANY($1))
                    AND (cast($2 as flow_status_type) IS NULL or flow_status = $2)
                    AND (cast($3 as TEXT[]) IS NULL OR initiator = ANY($3))
                ORDER BY flow_id DESC
                LIMIT $4 OFFSET $5
